title: A.I. & SingularityNet a $5T market
description: How can we create a mutually beneficial partnership with SingularityNet and other A.I. developers and researchers?

f6_assessments.q0: In terms of mission criticality this is one that can count. The potential to solve multiple scaling issues that we are experiencing today could come greatly to this community's benefit and with forces combined, bring both Cardano and SNet on the radar as leading entities in the innovative technologies sector. Tapping into a huge market potential of 5T USD could spark a tremendous boost for both ecosystems.
f6_assessments.q1: Both communities have a lot of common goals and both are motivated to combine forces and explore a profound collaboration. Judging from the comments section, SNet is being informed and prepared by Dr. Ben Goertzel himself. As AI-integration is set to become one of the largest emerging markets for the coming century, the potential is enormous en therefore highly feasible to have a beneficial outcome if a challenge were dedicated to it. The sooner it happens, the better our position would be in this emerging market.
f6_assessments.q2: The metrics to measure are set correctly and the chosen portion of fund to dedicate to the challenge, being more modest compared to the total fund, increase chances of coming into reality. What could have improved it, although SNet is well known within our own community, are some links to their marketplace so voters and CAs can check it out and something to verify the numbers under the marketplace/news/facts section.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal provides additional initiative to bring greater synergy between SNET and Cardano. Embracing AI on all levels will provide edge against competing chains.

AI market as mentioned is expected to grow considerably into all industries and if Cardano can fully integrate such solutions for businesses and industry will drive the need for ADA. In additions, SNET will run on top of Cardano.

SNET and Cardano also share the future vision of inclusion and decentralization.
f6_assessments.q1:
The challenge explores the potential of Cardano and SNET community to address the challenge. There is without a question a solid amount of teams and individuals from both sides already working on joint solutions and could expand such work in the future.

In addition, independent AI researchers (academia) could use the Catalyst funds to build AI services on SNET on Cardano. There is talent outside the giants like Tesla, Amazon, Google, Apple and Microsoft that want a different world.

Based on the insight into Cardano and SNET community there is no doubt that such challenge will be fruitful and further accelerate partnership.
f6_assessments.q2:
The success criteria are mentioned such as: teams and individuals on Catalyst, exposure to SingularityNet's technologies, collaborations, partnership.

However, it could be expanded by more tangible goals instead of descriptive such as number of proposals, value of proposals, new users/market/opportunities.

f6_assessments.q0: I agree with this proposal because  I think that its  important that we develop proposals that combine Cardano and AI in order to create world changing solutions. This is the way of the future and the only way to ensure the tech giants dont dominate it is to ensure democratization by use of Cardano and other cryptocurrencies.
f6_assessments.q1: The budget for this project is reasonable .
f6_assessments.q2:
The verifiability of this is clear. Metrics have been identified, a roadmap has been laid out to be carried out.
Metrics include 
Return on intention
Number of proposals submitted
Number of proposals with teams composed of both Cardano and SingularityNet community members
Number of proposals with new and innovative solutions
Number of proposals with ongoing development envisioned

f6_assessments.q0:
First off, I must say that I am a massive supporter of SingularityNet and think they are definitely going to be right alongside Cardano leading the future. I am also extremely supportive of having "a world for [challenge proposer's] kids and community where Artificial Intelligence's goals are as beneficial and ethical as Cardano's. 
At the same time, I am not sold that this challenge is critical to achieving Cardano's mission as there already exists a significant amount of collaboration between the two ecosystems with SN ready to launch now that smart contracts are live. 
The challenge proposer could go further and explain why a challenge is the right mechanism by which to promote this partnership. Is there currently a lack of partnership going on? If yes, is the barrier to making the partnerships actually the funding? If it's not funding, how would a challenge help?
f6_assessments.q1:
I wholeheartedly believe that the Catalyst community has the capacity to address this challenge. The reason why I am only giving it a 4/5 is because the Cardano community is only half of the equation. I would like to see the challenge setting proposer include some more information on the SN community: how many people are there? Has there been expressed interest from the SN community to use catalyst as a mechanism for growth? Is there already overlap between SN developers and Cardano developers (i.e. are there many that are both?). 
Providing details on such questions would be valuable.
f6_assessments.q2:
Unfortunately, I think this proposal still needs work in developing success criteria and suggested metrics to measure progress in addressing the challenge. 
The challenge setting proposer confuses these a bit by dividing "success criteria" into two different sections: the first one seems as an overview of key features of both systems; and the second one is a more qualitative than something that can be measured. I think putting down more tangible success criteria would help this challenge setting proposal. 
While I appreciate the challenge setting proposer including key metrics to measure, there is only one in the list that actually would be measurable to demonstrate success in the challenge: Number of proposals with teams composed of both Cardano and SingularityNet community members. The rest of the metrics are too generic and do not differentiate the need for a dedicated challenge vis-à-vis all other catalyst funding challenges. 
Love the idea but need to see more concrete outcomes and metrics.

importance: The SingularityNet/Cardano partnership can make a beneficial powerhouse that drives this century's innovations in Artificial Intelligence
success:
Cardano + SinguarityNet is known for

*   Beneficial AI
*   Innovation
*   Improving lives
*   Improving human potential
*   Efficiency
